snippet.title: Total War: ATTILA - The Last Roman Campaign Pack Trailer  PEGI UK
snippet.description:
The Last Roman Campaign Pack is an epic expansion for Total War: ATTILA – Including a huge new campaign map, this expansion also features a unique new “Roman Expedition” faction as one of 5 playable factions. This gives players the chance to experience the story of Belisarius, one of the last great Roman generals, who was tasked with retaking the former Western Roman Empire by the Emperor Justinian.

Players can chose to follow the Emperor’s orders and liberate territory in his name, or break from his rule in defiant rebellion and attempt to crown themselves as a new Emperor of Rome.

The Last Roman is Available to pre-order now: http://store.steampowered.com/app/343462/

Video type: In-Game Cinematic
What does this mean? Full details here: http://wiki.totalwar.com/w/About_our_trailers
